channel.title: Slides on Ubuntu Korea Community
channel.description: Recent content in Slides on Ubuntu Korea Community

item.title: Ubuntu 23.10
item.description: Ubuntu 23.10 Mantic Minotaur is the latest version released in October 2023. You can get it today, and run it on various environments such as Desktop, Servers, IoT, Cloud and much more.

item.title: UbuCon Korea 2023
item.description: Following the success of last year’s UbuCon Asia, UbuCon Korea will be held at Sept 9th at Microsoft Korea. With the theme “Ubuntu for Developer Productivity”
